name: Weedo-IT
overview:
Weedo-IT is an advertising agency specialized in lead performance.

The company has earned an good reputation with clients such as Keltravo, Fiat, Assuragency, ACE-Insurance, LaFourchette.com, VistaPrint or Securitas Direct.

With more than 50 clients, Weedo-IT has built a solid experience in various fields: insurance, gaming, social networking & meeting, auto, home & garden, health & beauty, B2B, media, shopping & sales, finance, food & drink.

The web marketing specialists can offer a range of solutions to its clients for their web strategy: email marketing, banners, site-unders, and also paid search, social networking, mobile advertising, co-registration …

Weedo-IT has a network of over 500 publishers, representing 60 million prospects both in France and abroad: Spain, United Kingdom, Belgium, Netherlands, Germany, Italy …

Weedo-IT has also created a dedicated interface and developed its own tracking tool for a simpleand transparent relationship with its partners. This tool allows the editors to be independent: choice of the campaign, download of the graphic elements and statistics tracking.
